backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing access control, user profiles, configurable API URL, and aircraft tracking data storage with admin/user permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence metadata linking features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for key frontend files used in the radar UI and data handling system.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and global radar-themed styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing the root container and loading the React application script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing authentication, profile setup flow, and rendering the flight radar dashboard.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog allowing new users to enter and save their name to create a profile.
frontend/src/components/radar/AircraftDe: Details panel showing selected aircraft information including category, telemetry, and position with close controls.
frontend/src/components/radar/CategoryFi: Provides toggle buttons to enable or disable commercial, military, and general aviation aircraft filters.
frontend/src/components/radar/DataProvid: Dialog for viewing and updating the aircraft data API URL using backend queries.
frontend/src/components/radar/MapPresets: Renders buttons to switch between predefined map view presets such as US and Schenectady-Albany.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarMap.t: Custom map component that renders aircraft positions with panning, zooming, and preset-centered views.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAircraftTracks.ts: Fetches aircraft data from the configured API URL and normalizes OpenSky response entries for display.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login handling, and stored identity restoration via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines backend query and mutation hooks for user profiles, API URL management, and aircraft track histories.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and a radar-themed light/dark color system plus utility classes and Leaflet UI overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
Implements the main radar dashboard with map display, category filters, presets, aircraft selection, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/utils/aircraftCategory.ts: Provides logic to derive aircraft categories from OpenSky category codes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with radar-themed OKLCH color variables, component extensions, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, existing radar features, and image requirements for build planning.
